data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Games::Boggle tests various words to see if they are present on a
    boggle board. It does not provide functionality to create a board.

    Games::Boggle::Board creates a random boggle board which is
    compatible with Games::Boggle. However, it does not have to be used
    with this module -- it could be used on its own to play boggle.
